item.title: Bank Simpanan Nasional has launched virtual teller machines in Malaysia
item.description:
Bank Simpanan Nasional (BSN) is the first bank in Malaysia to introduce virtual teller machines (VTMs). These machines allow bank tellers to assist customers in different locations throughout Malaysia remotely, through a live virtual banking system. BSN’s adoption of VTMs was inspired by kiosk banking already in place in other countries, including those in Europe, China, Canada, and the US. The project is a collaboration between BSN and Vastcomp to develop a specialized system...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bank-simpanan-nasional-has-launched-virtual-teller-machines-in-malaysia/
